title: Sion bug

embed.description: Pagan Online a new hack-n-slash Action RPG has officially launched. Buy Pagan Online on Steam! http://bit.ly/2lIZzia Check out #PaganOnline hashtag on Twitter for more info. Claim the treasures of the gods! Want to watch more? Full AP Shen ➤ https://bit.ly/2GHvQ0E Last weeks LOT ➤ https://bit.ly/2kH8pwz ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ Music 1.

body:
Da tempo immemorabile con bug su ogni spell. Prossima patch li fixeranno? Frustrante giocare un champ del genere. 
{{champion:14}}

replies.body:
"Frustrante giocare un champ del genere."

Giocare o giocarci contro?
